comments.author: cam@mcc.id.au
comments.text:
With a debug build, I get this warning on startup:

```
WARN  rkv::backend::impl_safe::environment] Ignoring `map_size=16777216`
```

It's probably not useful to tell everyone this.  Let's turn it into a code comment so that we remember to set the map size once cert_storage switches to the LMDB backend.
